Export.Routine: MIF407RU03(mi) ; ASTM protocol - DXI (Bi-Directional) (Russion BION)) s mi=$g(mi) i '$l(mi) q k ^TMIF(mi,10) s $zt="err^MIF000" i $$select^LVBMIMP(mi) q f j=1:1:PLIST s @("par"_j)=PLIST(j) s stx=$c(2),etx=$c(3),ack=$c(6),enq=$c(5),eot=$c(4),nak=$c(21) s lf=$c(10),cr=$c(13),(result,epis,containernumber)="" i $$start^MIF000() q d trace^MIF000(mi,"Started job="_$j,"DEBUG") f d Main i $$stop^MIF000() q c par4 d trace^MIF000(mi,"Closed job="_$j,"DEBUG") q Main r *R:10 ;i $c(R)'=enq d trace^MIF000(mi,"Waiting <ENQ> but received <"_R_">","H<--M") q i $c(R)'=enq q d trace^MIF000(mi,"ENQ","H<--M") d ACK f r *R:10 q:$c(R)=eot d . i $c(R)'=stx q . s record=$$read^MIF000("",lf) q:'$l(record) . s record=$e(record,1,$l(record)-1) . d trace^MIF000(mi,$tr(record,$c(13,3)," "),"H<--M") . ; check record validity . s chsum=$p(record,etx,2),chrecord=$p(record,etx,1)_etx . i $$CHSUM(chrecord)'=chsum d NAK q . d ACK . ; query record . i $e(record,2)="Q" d q .. Set containernumber=$Piece($Piece(record,"|",3),"^",2) .. Set epis=$$Episode4Container^KSMIF000(containernumber) .. If epis="" Quit .. Set ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis)=containernumber . ; patient record .i $e(record,2)="P" d q .. d Last s (sample,epis,containernumber,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" .. s surname=$tr($tr($p(record,"|",6),""),"^"," ") q . ; order record .i $e(record,2)="O" d q .. Set containernumber=$Piece($Piece(record,"|",3),"^",1) .. If containernumber="" Set containernumber=$tr($p($p(record,"|",4),"^",1)," ") .. ; check if received id is QC .. s QC="" i $l(containernumber) s QC=$$findQC^MIF000(mi,containernumber) .. if QC'="" set epis=containernumber .. else Set epis=$$Episode4Container^KSMIF000(containernumber) .. ;Set QC=$tr($p(record,"|",12)," ") .. ;i QC="Q" s QC="Y" .. ; . ; result record . i $e(record,2)="R" d q .. ; strip trailing spaces .. s x1=$p($p(record,"|",3),"^",4) s xx1=x1 f i=$l(x1):-1 q:$e(x1,i)'=" " s xx1=$e(x1,1,i-1) .. s x1=xx1,x2=$tr($p(record,"|",4),", ","."),x3=$tr($p(record,"|",7)," ") .. i x3="N" s x3="" ; normal flag .. i $l(x1),$l(x2) s result=result_x1_$c(par10)_x2_$c(par10)_x3_$c(par11) .. ; date and time .. i $l($tr($p(record,"|",13)," ")) d ... s date=$$intdate^SSUTIL4($e($p(record,"|",13),5,6)_"/"_$e($p(record,"|",13),7,8)_"/"_$e($p(record,"|",13),1,4)) ... s time=($e($p(record,"|",13),9,10)*3600)+($e($p(record,"|",13),11,12)*60) . ; last record . i $e(record,2)="L" d Last q d trace^MIF000(mi,$s($c(R)=eot:"EOT",1:R),"H<--M") d ORDER q Last ; file result if exists i $get(epis)'="",$l(result) { do trace^MIF000(mi,"Write results episode="_$g(epis)_": "_$g(result)_" date="_$g(date)_" time="_$g(time)_" QC="_$g(QC),"H<--H") d file^MIF000(mi,sample,epis,surname,result,date,time,QC) } s (sample,epis,containernumber,surname,result,date,time,QC)="" q ORDER ; create list of orders if exists s epis="" f s epis=$o(^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis),1,containernumber) q:epis="" d . d scanone^MIF000(mi,epis) . i $$select^LVBEPVIS(epis,"Y") k ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis) q . s sex=$s($g(PLIST(5))="лю":"M",$g(PLIST(5))="лќ":"F",1:"U") . s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="P|1|"_epis_"|||||||||||" . s tc="" . f N=1:1 s tc=$o(^TMP("MIF-SINGLE",$j,mi,epis,tc)) q:tc="" d .. If (epis'=containernumber)&&('$$IsTestCode4Container^KSMIF000(containernumber,mi,tc)) Quit .. Do SET(containernumber,tc) . s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="L|1|"_$s(N>1:"F",1:"I") . k ^TMP($zn,$j,"ENQ",epis) . d Send q SET(containernumber,tcx) ; set record to be sent to instrument s line=$o(^TMIF(mi,10,""),-1)+1,^TMIF(mi,10,line)="O|"_N_"|"_containernumber_"||^^^"_tcx_"|||||||N||||||||||||||Q" q Send ; send list of orders if exists d ENQ f j=1:1:10 r *R:1 i $c(R)=ack!($c(R)=enq) q i $c(R)=enq q i $c(R)'=ack d EOT q q:$$SEND("1H|\^&||parol|LIS|||||DXI||P|1") s x="" f FRAME=2:1 s x=$O(^TMIF(mi,10,x)) q:x="" q:$$SEND(FRAME#8_^TMIF(mi,10,x)) i x="" k ^TMIF(mi,10) d EOT q SEND(str) ; send string to instrument s str=str_cr_etx,chsum=$$CHSUM(str) w stx,str,chsum,cr,lf,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,str_chsum,"H-->M") f j=1:1:6 r *R:1 i ($c(R)=ack)!($c(R)=eot) q i $c(R)=ack d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H<--M") q 0 i $c(R)=eot d trace^MIF000(mi,"EOT","H<--M") q 1 d trace^MIF000(mi,R,"H<--M") q 2 CHSUM(x) ; calculate check sum n (x) s z=0 f y=1:1:$l(x) s z=z+$a(x,y) s z=$e("0123456789ABCDEF",z#256\16+1)_$e("0123456789ABCDEF",z#16+1) q z ACK w ack,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"ACK","H-->M") q NAK w nak,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"NAK","H-->M") q EOT w eot,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"EOT","H-->M") q ENQ w enq,*-3 d trace^MIF000(mi,"EEQ","H-->M") q
